/ip firewall mangle
add action=mark-routing chain=prerouting dst-address-list=!bogon \    new-routing-mark=VPN-1 passthrough=no src-address-list=mangle-1
add action=mark-routing chain=prerouting dst-address-list=!bogon \    new-routing-mark=VPN-2 passthrough=no src-address-list=mangle-2

add action=mark-routing chain=prerouting dst-address-list=!bogon \    new-routing-mark=VPN-4 passthrough=no src-address-list=mangle-4
add action=mark-routing chain=prerouting dst-address-list=!bogon \    new-routing-mark=VPN-5 passthrough=no src-address-list=mangle-5
